exam.question: We all enjoy our freedom of choice and do not like to see it______ when it is within the legal and moral boundaries of society.

answer.explain: 句意： 我们都享有自由选择的权利， 不希望看到它在社会的法律和道德范围内还受到限制。compact： 压紧， 紧凑； delay： 推迟。

sentences.sContent: Police used tear gas to disperse the crowd.
sentences.sCn: 警察用催泪瓦斯驱散人群。

phrases.pCn: 分散体系；分散系统；分散物系

remMethod.val: di(分开) ＋ sperse(散开) → (使)分散； 参考： disappear (vi. 消失)

words.tran: 散布的；被分散的；被驱散的
散布；[统计][数] 离差；驱散
分散；传播；散布；疏散；消失

trans.tranCn: 分散， 赶散； 消散， 驱散
trans.tranOther: if a group of people disperse or are dispersed, they go away in different directions

trans.tranCn: 使分散，散开；使消散，消失
trans.tranOther: if a group of people disperse or are dispersed, they go away in different directions
